column1: The Purple Pig////Was the highlight of my Chicago trip. I was able to make a lunch reservation fairly easily by calling in on a Monday afternoon. We were seated promptly and the waitress gave us a rundown on what's popular and things to get. No surprise
column2: she mentioned the Bone Marrow (which we were going to get anyway) the Grilled broccoli
column3: and Crispy Pig Ears. We got all three of them. The Bone Marrow was LEGIT. Perfectly roasted
column5: paired with herbs (believe they were parsley from memory)
column6: and nice toasted bread. It was like spreading butter onto the bread
column7: so smooth and good! I would get this EVERY TIME.
